crimeIndex.status: Generally safe for tourists, but be aware of petty theft.

visa.req: Many nationalities can enter Indonesia without a visa for tourism purposes for up to 30 days. Check specific requirements based on your nationality.

language.name: Balinese, Indonesian
language.detail: Balinese is widely spoken, but Indonesian is the national language and understood everywhere. English is also spoken in tourist areas.

transport: Flights from Jakarta to Denpasar (Bali's airport), then taxi or private transfer to Ubud.
